title: Art Contest
body:
Hi, 

I am looking for some artistic people to design some logos for my current projects. I have 2 branding name ideas and would like to run a competition so I can review entries and decide which logos to use.

The naming of the brands are :-

SCC- South Coast Connection.
DPM- Digital Puppet Master. 

Send entries to ja3ie@outlook.com with the brand name as the title before 28th March 2017. I will offer a $50 prize to winner for each brand. 

Winners will be announced on 7th April 2017.
